name: MindSplit
description:
Title: MindSplit

Platform: Browser

Genre: Coop Puzzle

Rating: E

Target Market: Ages 12+, casual gamers

Game Overview: MindSplit is a four player cooperative puzzle game where players must work together to complete each level. Instead of each player being assigned a character, each player is assigned a cardinal direction that they can move all characters in. The game features various levels of increasing difficulty so you and your friends will always have a new challenge to choose from.

Instructions: To complete each level, you must cooperate with your friends to move each colored cube to is corresponding goal. Each player can tap their key to toggle between the characters on screen, and hold it to start the characters move in that direction. But be careful, once a character starts moving it wont stop until it hits a wall, pushing all other characters along the way.

Game Design Team: JP Tucker
